violations.pattern: Repeated error handling patterns with try-catch blocks
violations.recommendation: Create a centralized error handling utility with common error types and handlers

violations.pattern: Duplicated API call patterns with similar fetch/axios implementations
violations.recommendation: Extract into a shared API client with common request/response handling

violations.pattern: Repeated validation logic for form inputs and data structures
violations.recommendation: Create a shared validation library with reusable validators

violations.pattern: Similar React component structures with minor variations
violations.recommendation: Extract common component patterns into higher-order components or custom hooks

violations.pattern: Repeated import statements and dependency patterns
violations.recommendation: Create barrel exports and standardize import patterns
